mapper.insert: insert into ts_student (id, name, gender, gmt_created, gmt_modified) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select id, name, gender, gmt_created, gmt_modified from ts_student
